I think this would be better written using async/await, like this:

export async function fetchAllActions() {
  const requestId = 'fetch-actions-all';
  const actions = await makeApiRequests(requestId, 'action/', { method: 'GET' });

  for (const action of actions) {
    dispatch({
      type: ACTION_RECEIVE,
      action,
    });
  }
}
